cards

Class QuestionCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • cards.Card
      • cards.QuestionCard

  • public class QuestionCard
extends Card
    A type object that represents a question card (The black cards in Cards Against Humanity).
    The classes QuestionCard and AnswerCard are different because QuestionCards allow the card to require the user to play or draw a certain number of cards.
    Since:
    CAH1.0
    Version:
    CAH1.0
    Author:
    Holt Maki
    See Also:
    AnswerCard}, {@linkplain Card}
